segments.text: Watch out ! You'll hit that car if you're not careful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh no , I won't . But we will have an accident if you don't stop shouting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You see . I told you you'd hit him if you weren't careful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , shut up , will you ? It was all your fault.If you'd kept quite this would never have happened .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , so it was my fault , was it ? If I hadn't warned you in time it would have been much worse .
segments.speaker: S1
